text: Prodicus is a genus of millipedes in the family Anthroleucosomatidae. There are at least three described species in Prodicus. ==Species== * Prodicus apenninorum Verhoeff, 1930 * Prodicus attemsi Verhoeff, 1900 * Prodicus macchiae Verhoeff, 1930 ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * Category:Chordeumatida
title: Prodicus (millipede)
